practiceAreas: High End Family Law|Personal Injury|Dental Malpractice
description:
From our law office in Bridgeport, Connecticut, the attorneys at MeehanLaw, LLC, deliver unmatched counsel and support to clients throughout Fairfield County and beyond who have serious and complex legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Family law and high-asset divorce
  • DUI, drug violations, and all other types of felonies and misdemeanors
  • Personal injury and dental and medical malpractice
  • General civil litigation

Since 1961, our attorneys have served the residents and businesses of our region, and we have achieved remarkable success helping our clients find the quality, effective solutions they seek for their important legal issues as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible. Regarded as among the most esteemed attorneys in the country, our lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell as well as numerous five-star reviews from our satisfied clients.

This success is the direct result of our extensive legal experience coupled with our unwavering commitment to those we serve. When you choose to work with us, you can rely on us for the personalized advice you need to make the best-informed decisions as we aggressively pursue the most favorable outcome for your unique situation. As further evidence of our success, our law firm has grown to include an additional office in Westport, so you are never far away from the professional and dedicated legal counsel when you need it the most.

For more information on how we can best assist you with your legal matter, you can contact MeehanLaw, LLC, to schedule a consultation. Our law firm also offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your family safe and healthy.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
